title: Shotcalling in Solo Ranked
body: Works REALLY well. (Y) Just a tip for anyone who has trouble climbing. So far, it works well for me.

replies.body:
Yeah, it works really well in low elo and can be the deciding factor of the game because most people are at average/below average mechanical skill. 

(Also works in high elo but everyone is better skill wise there)

Yeah definitely! Like I'm not saying I could run an LCS team, but I used to shotcall for some of my 5's teams and I also watch a lot of pro play and kinda take on the strategies. So in solo ranked, I always dictate my team. (In the nicest way possible). And they usually listen to me! I call which lanes to push, which turrets to take, which objectives to prep for, who to target. And it works SO well. It kinda gets cumbersome at times tho and I kinda feel like it sometimes drains the fun out a LITTLE bit. But grind grind grind right? hahaha
dont forget dragon timers when you dont see it :^)
Hahah yes I do record it!
